title: 1. 配置开发环境
content:
安装 Python     官网 https://www.python.org/downloads/
MacOS 安装 python     安装最新版本
brew install python 安装指定版本
brew install python@3.10 使用 brew 安装的软件， 都会有软连接到 /opt/homebrew/bin 。 设置 PATH
export PATH=/opt/homebrew/bin:$PATH 查看 python 安装情况      注意 每一个 python 版本都有自己 独立 的依赖管理。 代码虽然通用 ， 但是 管理彼此独立。 例如在 python3.10 装了 pyyaml, 在 python3.13 还需要装一次。
 查看所有 brew 安装的 python
$ ls -al /opt/homebrew/bin | grep python lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 43 11 27 22:25 2to3-3.10 -> ../Cellar/python@3.10/3.10.15/bin/2to3-3.10 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 38 3 5 10:45 idle3 -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/idle3 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 42 11 27 22:25 idle3.10 -> ../Cellar/python@3.10/3.10.15/bin/idle3.10 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 41 3 5 10:45 idle3.13 -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/idle3.13 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 37 3 5 10:45 pip3 -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/pip3 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 41 11 27 22:25 pip3.10 -> ../Cellar/python@3.10/3.10.15/bin/pip3.10 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 40 3 5 10:45 pip3.13 -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/pip3.13 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 39 3 5 10:45 pydoc3 -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/pydoc3 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 43 11 27 22:25 pydoc3.10 -> ../Cellar/python@3.10/3.10.15/bin/pydoc3.10 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 42 3 5 10:45 pydoc3.13 -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/pydoc3.13 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 40 3 5 10:45 python3 -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/python3 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 47 3 5 10:45 python3-config -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/python3-config lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 44 11 27 22:25 python3.10 -> ../Cellar/python@3.10/3.10.15/bin/python3.10 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 51 11 27 22:25 python3.10-config -> ../Cellar/python@3.10/3.10.15/bin/python3.10-config lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 43 3 5 10:45 python3.13 -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/python3.13 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 50 3 5 10:45 python3.13-config -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/python3.13-config lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 39 3 5 10:45 wheel3 -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/wheel3 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 43 11 27 22:25 wheel3.10 -> ../Cellar/python@3.10/3.10.15/bin/wheel3.10 lrwxr-xr-x 1 user admin 42 3 5 10:45 wheel3.13 -> ../Cellar/python@3.13/3.13.2/bin/wheel3.13 使用 which 查看当前的 默认 python3
$ which python3 /opt/homebrew/bin/python3 查看 python 版本     $ python3 --version Python 3.13.2 由于 python 几乎是 Unix-Like 系统必备的软件了， 所以安装指定版本之后， 默认版本就可能不符合预期。 因此在开发的时候指定版本就很重要了。

title: 2. VSCode
content: 1. 插件 (微软插件全家桶)      Python Pylance : Python LSP Python Debugger : debug 插件 Mypy Type Checker : 类型检查  pip3 install mypy   Pylint : 代码分析  pip3 install pylint   Black Formatter : 格式化插件  pip3 install black   isort : import 排序  pip3 install isort    { // python "[python]": { "editor.defaultFormatter": "ms-python.black-formatter", "editor.formatOnSave": true, "editor.codeActionsOnSave": { "source.organizeImports": "explicit" }, }, // isort "isort.args": [ "--profile", "black" ], // mypy "mypy-type-checker.importStrategy": "useBundled", "mypy-type-checker.args": [ "--follow-imports=skip", "--ignore-missing-imports", "--show-column-numbers", "--allow-untyped-defs", "--allow-subclassing-any", "--allow-untyped-calls", "--no-warn-no-return" ], "python.analysis.inlayHints.functionReturnTypes": true, "python.analysis.typeCheckingMode": "standard", "python.analysis.inlayHints.callArgumentNames": "partial", "pythonIndent.keepHangingBracketOnLine": true, "pythonIndent.trimLinesWithOnlyWhitespace": true, "pythonIndent.useTabOnHangingIndent": true, "python.analysis.inlayHints.variableTypes": true, } 可选插件      代码高亮插件 Semantic highlighting : 通用插件， 可以指定 自定义类型 的颜色。  { // 定义类型提示的颜色 "editor.semanticTokenColorCustomizations": { // 插件: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=malcolmmielle.semantic-highlighting // 配置: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/71718939/syntax-highlighting-in-vscode-for-type-hints "rules": { // 自定义类型 "*.typeHint": { "foreground": "#C5A930", "fontStyle": [ "italic", "bold", "underline" ] }, // 内建类型 "class.typeHint.builtin": { "foreground": "#6156AB", "fontStyle": "italic" } } }, }
